attributes.action: Review rules relating to blue badges for children under three
attributes.additional_details: I believe the current rules reduce the ability of disabled children under three to visit parks, attend children centres and engage in public life. For families with multiple children with disabilities this can have even more of an impact.
attributes.background: The current rules relating to blue badges have specific criteria relating to children under three. I want the government to review these rules, including the equalities impacts on disabled children.
